Like most companies, preventing a team member from leaving is extremely difficult. Therefore, while increasing the retention period of team members is important, enabling them to adapt quickly and extend their contribution period is much more manageable.

item.title: Newsfeed 2023
item.description: December 2023 The Big Cloud Exit FAQ by @dhh This isnâ€™t some archaic knowledge thatâ€™s been lost to the ages. We might not know exactly how the pyramids were built, but we do still know how to connect a Linux machine to the internet. I think many of us are forgetting this. “buy the baseline, rent the spike” 100% agree. Constant Propagation in Compiler Design In simpler words, we can say that if some value is assigned a known constant, than we can simply replace the that value by constant.
